name: Day 1 - Arrival and Check-in
details: Check-in to your hotel and relax after your journey.

name: Day 2 - Explore the City
details: Visit the iconic Eiffel Tower and enjoy the stunning view of Paris from the top.

name: Day 3 - Museum Day
details: Spend the day exploring the world-famous Louvre Museum and admire its incredible art collections.

name: Day 4 - River Seine Cruise
details: Take a relaxing boat cruise along the River Seine and enjoy the breathtaking views of the city.

name: Day 5 - Versailles Palace
details: Visit the stunning Versailles Palace and its beautiful gardens, and learn about its fascinating history.

name: Day 6 - Food Tour
details: Join a guided food tour and taste some of the best French cuisine in the city.

name: Day 7 - Departure
details: Check-out from your hotel and say goodbye to the city of love and light.
